name: Holiday Chair Backer Sewing PDF/Pattern
description:
Waiting for those Holiday treats to pour in is even more exciting with this festive Mail Pouch. It hangs on your chair, waiting for treats to arrive. Perfect for school or home. 

***Photo shown is of a Valentine's Chair Backer, but it would also make a great Halloween, Christmas or Easter Chair Backer!! Just change the colors!!!!!!!!!

Listing includes a PDF Pattern and Tutorial for a pouch that hangs on the back of a chair.

PDF includes full instructions along with color photos illustrating each step.

It also includes the template for the alphabet to use on the bag and the template for the heart.

The pouch is constructed of canvas, lined with fabric & embellished with felt. The overall dimensions are approx. 8.5" wide by 9.5" tall by 1" deep.

Please note: This is a sewing pattern in PDF form, not a paper copy, you will receive it via email.

name: March Bag, Handbag Sewing Pattern pdf
description:
The March Bag a fourteen may sewing pattern PDF / tutorial / epattern

The March Bag is a sewing pattern that would make a great tote bag or everyday purse!

It features 2 large outside pockets that are pleated, so you can fit A LOT of stuff in them!

It features a choice of 3 different handles, a smaller interior pocket and a magnetic snap closure. The bag measures approximately 14.5" tall (not including handles) by 14" wide. 

Pattern includes instructions for 3 handle/strap variations.

This bag can be made using 44" wide fabric OR 9 fat quarters. (a fat quarter is an 18"x22" piece of fabric). You will also need various other interfacings/notions. Full instructions are provided in the pdf.

After you complete your purchase you will automatically be emailed a link to download your pattern. 

Included are printable pattern pieces (designed to print on 8 1/2 x 11 paper) and full color instructions with photos to guide you at each step.

Instructions to make the fabric flower are included.

name: The July Bag,  Tote / Beach Bag sewing pattern PDF
description:
Do you need a great bag to tote all of your goods around with you??

Introducing the newest fourteen may pattern, the July Bag.

I designed the July bag to be perfect to tote to the pool or the beach. It measures approx 15.5" tall by 17" wide by 3" deep.  Plenty of room for all of your goodies.

This bag is unique in that it can be constructed of Burlap that is specially reinforced to make the bag sturdy. Instructions for reinforcing the burlap are included in the pattern.  It is lined in quilting weight fabric, so you can add a fun pop of color to the inside of your bag!  

This pattern can also be made from decor weight fabric as shown in the photo. All instructions are the same for working with the decor weight fabric, as for working with the burlap.

Included is a sewing pattern and tutorial in PDF format with:
18 pages of instructions
Materials list
Color photographs to guide you step by step
Printable Pattern pieces
Instructions to make the fabric flower

All available to you via Instant Pattern Download!

Please feel free to ask me any questions you have. You can visit my blog at http://www.polkadotchair.com

Pattern is in Adobe Acrobat format.

After you complete your purchase you will automatically be emailed a link to download your pattern.

name: June Bag, Mini Messenger Bag Sewing Pattern PDF
description:
You will LOVE making the June Bag, a fourteen may pattern! 

It's a cross body bag sewing pattern.  Make yourself a  mini messenger bag that is perfect for traveling. It is delivered to you via instant download, in PDF format. The pattern is written using FULL color photos of each step.

When I design bags I want them to fulfill a purpose.  I need a great bag that would be light weight and easy to carry when I traveled and the June Bag was born!  It measures approx. 8"x10" x 1" deep.

The only fabric needed to make this bag are 4 fat quarters! A great way to use up some of your scraps. (a fat quarter is an 18"x22" piece of fabric). You will also need various other interfacings/notions. Full instructions are provided in the pdf.

Pattern is in Adobe Acrobat format and includes full color photos and step by step instructions.

After you complete your purchase you will automatically be emailed a link to download your pattern.

name: Sunday Bag, A Tote bag Sewing Pattern PDF
description:
The Sunday bag, a fourteen may sewing pattern,  is a chic, yet roomy and sturdy bag. Perfect for carrying around all of your stuff whether it's to church, work or a school meeting. This bag will help you tote your stuff in style! It's tall enough to accommodate a binder and wide enough to fit a few books.

The pattern calls for this bag to be made from 54" wide home decor weight fabric, this gives it strength and stability. You CAN make it with 44" weight quilt fabric, I give instructions in the pattern for the conversion, but I think it works best with home decor weight fabric.

Bag has a magnetic snap closure and measures approx. 13.5" tall x 19" wide x 4.5" deep. It features 2 inside pockets. One small one for things like your cell phone and one very large and deep one for everything else! It would make a great diaper bag for someone.

Included is a pattern and tutorial in PDF format with:
9 pages of instructions
Materials list
Color photographs to guide you step by step

The pattern includes instructions for both the fabric stripe and ribbon ruffle down the center of the bag front.

Please feel free to ask me any questions you have. You can visit my blog at www.polkadotchair.com

Pattern is in Adobe Acrobat format.

After you complete your purchase you will automatically be emailed a link to instantly download your pattern.
